name: Well-Rounded
content:
Description

You have a versatile education, a wide range of experiences, or just plain old good luck. The result is that you're pretty good at things you're not specialized in.

Effect

Any time you use an attribute with a score of 2 or less to make an action roll outside of combat that is not a bane or boon invocation, you gain advantage 1 to the roll.

data.description: You have a versatile education, a wide range of experiences, or just plain old good luck. The result is that you're pretty good at things you're not specialized in.
data.effect: Any time you use an attribute with a score of 2 or less to make an action roll outside of combat that is not a bane or boon invocation, you gain advantage 1 to the roll.
